name: the Unfinished NadeJumping game
description:
A unseemingly short and anger inducing FPS climb platformer where you use explosions to blast yourself upwards towards the tip of a tower.

Controls: 

  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to look around.
  • Left mouse click to shoot.
  • E to throw grenades.
  • Z to zoom.

You can change  mouse sensitivity, FOV and sound volume in the settings.

The original submission for  My First Game Jame: Winter 2023 is the downloadable standalone version. The WebGL version I intend to update and improve until I'm satisfied with it. It will be different.

Sounds were downloaded from freesound.org and are public domain. Full credits are availiable in main menu.

 Everything else was made by me.
